= Needed steps =

  * Download Debian Wheezy ([http://www.raspberrypi.org/downloads download])
  * Install it using dd / Win32 diskimager (found on raspberry dl page)
  * Make the first setup of Raspberry (Overclocking it is recommended)
  * Then Run the following lines of code:

{{{
   sudo -s
}}}
{{{
   apt-get update && apt-get upgrade
}}}
{{{   
   apt-get install arduino openjdk-6-jdk samba vftpd
}}}
